pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 19, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, July 19, 2017:

Québec, Quebec

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Rendez-vous 2017 Tall Ships Regatta event and will deliver remarks.

Quai 14
Port of Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and photo opportunity for visit of ship
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. and enter via the media registration entrance

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Patro Laval day camp to highlight the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Patro Laval
145 rue Bigaouette

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity and open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Citadelle de Québec and will be made an honorary member of the Royal 22nd Regiment.

La Citadelle de Québec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:30 p.m. via main entrance
